channel.title: antd on 代码笔记
channel.description: Recent content in antd on 代码笔记

item.title: ant design pro查看官网预览源码
item.description: emmm觉得官网的demo例子写的不错，想照着抄一下 克隆仓库git clone https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design-pro.git 进入项目目录yarn安装依赖 yarn run pro fetch-blocks --branch=v5获取代码块 yarn start就可以在本地跑起来demo了 config/routes.ts是路由文件，src/pages里面是源码
